title: shenru vA nI rAdhE indap-pOdE ini
sahitya:
(rAgA:  kalyANi)   
  shenru vA nI rAdhE indap-pOdE ini cintanai sheidiDa nEramillaiyaDi


anupallavi

  kanru pashu mEikkum nATTattilE avaraik-kANa varum Ayark-kUTTattilE shaTru ninru pEsha enrAl nEramillaiyaDi 
				(rAg  kAmbhOji)


caraNam 1    shonnAlum puriyAdE unakkut-tannAlum tOnrAdE anda 
mannanai nambAdE anda mAyan vAkku ellAm maN tinra vAi tAnE
    caraNam 2  				(rAga:  vasantA)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 M1 G3 R1 S  ulagai aLandOrkku unniDam vandoru poi OTTi aLappadum bhAramA kaNNan nalam vandu Ayiram 
shonnAlum nAm adai nambiviDl enna nyAyamA Ayar kulattiraivan nanda gOpan tirumagan koLvadellAm 
uNmaiyAgumA nam talattarugE inru inru tanittu vara enrAl tavap-payanAgumE vinaiyappan pOgumE
